details:
Bugatti GT60 Car Led Headlight Bulb 40000LM|6500K|400W|H4
Improve your driving experience using LED Headlight Bulbs Each set comes with an easy-to-follow installation guide, everyone can personally install them, and we really mean EVERYONE! Perfect beam pattern with no dark spots. Light up your road and enhance your visibility. Array chip design ensures 360º uniform light without any dark spots, providing a wider viewing angle. Mini Design. Small body for strong fit, it can be used on 99% of vehicle models. High power, Over 30,000 hrs of brilliant continuous light. The high pure white light of color temp 6500k. High brightness in the dark to secure your safety is a perfect replacement for the old and yellow bulbs.

Operating Life: >30000hrs

Waterproof

title: Zingfix Scratch Remover 120ML
details:
Description:
Say goodbye to light scratches, swirl marks, and paint dullness with the
Zingfix Scratch Remover Kit
—a complete solution that includes a 120ML bottle of high-performance scratch remover and a soft foam
Applicator Pad
for smooth, even application. This easy-to-use combo is designed to restore your vehicle’s finish, enhance gloss, and eliminate minor surface imperfections—all from the comfort of your garage.
Formulated with advanced micro-abrasives, the scratch remover gently polishes the surface, removing fine blemishes without damaging your paint. The included applicator pad ensures precise control and a professional finish with every use.
What’s Inside:
1 x 120ML Zingfix Scratch Remover
1 x Soft Foam Applicator Pad
Key Features:
Removes Light Scratches & Swirls:
Effectively reduces scuff marks, swirl lines, oxidation, and minor imperfections.
Includes Applicator Pad:
Makes application cleaner, faster, and more efficient.
Restores Shine & Clarity:
Polishes the paint to a brilliant, smooth finish.
Safe on All Paint Types:
Works on clear coats, metallic, and solid paint finishes.
DIY Friendly:
No machines or expertise needed—just apply, rub, and buff.
How to Use:
Clean and dry the area to be treated.
Pro Tip: For best results, avoid direct sunlight during application.
Apply a small amount of product to the included applicator pad.
Rub the product onto the surface using firm, circular motions.
Let it sit for a moment, then buff with a clean microfiber towel.
Repeat if needed for deeper marks.

title: Zingfix Ceramic Coating Spray
details:
Give your vehicle the ultimate shine and protection it deserves with
Zingfix Ceramic Coating Spray
—a professional-grade formula designed for car enthusiasts and detailers alike. Infused with
advanced SiO₂ (Silicon Dioxide) technology
, this spray forms a tough, long-lasting ceramic shield over your vehicle’s exterior that enhances gloss, increases surface slickness, and defends against harsh environmental elements.
Whether you're looking to maintain your car's paint job, increase shine, or reduce the need for frequent washes, Zingfix has you covered.
Key Features:
Advanced SiO₂ Protection:
Creates a hydrophobic and UV-resistant barrier that repels water, dirt, and grime.
Mirror-Like Gloss:
Deepens paint clarity and enhances color depth for that showroom shine.
Multi-Surface Safe:
Suitable for paint, plastic, chrome, headlights, glass, and even rims.
Quick & Easy Application:
No need for complicated tools or professional help—just spray, wipe, and buff.
Long-Lasting Results:
Provides durable protection for up to 3–6 weeks with a single application.
How to Use:
Wash and dry
your vehicle thoroughly to remove all dirt and contaminants.
Shake the bottle
well before use.
Spray a light mist
of Zingfix Ceramic Coating onto a clean microfiber towel or directly onto the surface.
Spread evenly
using the towel or an applicator pad in straight lines.
Buff gently
with a dry microfiber cloth until the surface is clear and glossy.
Allow the coating to
cure for 4–6 hours
for best results. Avoid water contact during this period.
Ideal For:
Daily drivers who want quick protection
Car detailers looking to enhance gloss and slickness
Anyone who wants water-beading magic and less time spent washing

title: Icon Plus 5-in-1 Premium Car Care Bundle
details:
All-in-One Shine: 5-in-1 Icon Plus Premium Car Care Bundle for a Showroom Finish
Transform your car care routine with our 5-in-1 Icon Plus Water Base Premium Car Care Bundle, designed to give your vehicle a showroom shine effortlessly. Perfect for enthusiasts and everyday drivers alike, this comprehensive kit includes everything you need to maintain your car's pristine condition.
Key Features:
● Brilliant Wash & Shine: Our specially formulated Icon Plus car wash shampoo gently removes dirt, grime, and road residue, leaving behind a streak-free, glossy finish.
● Ultimate Protection: The included Icon Plus shiny protectant shields your car's exterior from the elements, keeping it looking newer for longer.
● Crystal Clear View: Effortlessly remove fingerprints, smudges, and dirt from your windows and mirrors with our powerful Icon Plus glass cleaner, ensuring exceptional visibility and a safer driving experience.
● Scratch-Free Shine: The high-quality Icon Plus microfiber cloth gently buffs and polishes your car to a showroom shine, without leaving scratches or lint.
● Eco-Friendly Formula: Icon Plus water-based products are tough on dirt, but gentle on the environment.
Benefits:
● Effortless Car Care: This all-inclusive bundle provides everything you need for a complete car detailing at home.
● Saves Time & Money: Skip expensive car washes and detailing services. This bundle offers professional-grade results at a fraction of the cost.
● Long-Lasting Shine: Protect your car's paint job and keep it looking its best for months to come.
Order your 5-in-1 Water Base Premium Car Care Bundle today and experience the difference!

title: Zingfix Waterless Car Wash
details:
Zingfix Waterless Car Wash
The
Zingfix Waterless Car Wash
is a convenient, eco-friendly solution designed to clean and shine your vehicle without the need for water. Its advanced formula lifts dirt, dust, and grime from your car’s surface, providing a streak-free, polished finish. Ideal for use on paint, glass, chrome, and plastic surfaces, this waterless wash is perfect for quick touch-ups or when traditional washing isn’t possible. The product is safe for all vehicle finishes and includes protective agents that help preserve the shine while reducing the risk of scratches. Simply spray, wipe, and buff for a clean and glossy car in minutes.

title: Zingfix Car Magic Clay Bar Pad
details:
Zingfix Car Magic Clay Bar Pad
The Zingfix Car Magic Clay Bar Pad is a professional-grade car detailing accessory designed to remove stubborn contaminants from your vehicle’s surface. It effectively eliminates tree sap, overspray, brake dust, tar, and industrial fallout, leaving the paint smooth and ready for waxing or polishing.
How to Use:
1. Wash and rinse the vehicle thoroughly to remove surface dirt.
2. Use a clay lubricant or car wash soap solution to keep the surface wet.
3. Gently glide the clay pad over the surface in straight-line motions.
4. Wipe off residue with a microfiber towel and inspect the smoothness.
5. Clean the pad after use and store it in a cool, dry place.

title: Zingfix Microfiber Detailing Kit
details:
ZINGFIX MICROFIBER DETAILING KIT
• Premium Microfiber Towels: Includes high-density Microfiber Duo (950GSM) and Twist Microfiber (1200GSM) for superior absorption and streak-free drying.
• Versatile Cleaning Kit: Features a 9pcs microfiber kit and 600GSM towel for tackling all detailing tasks with ease.
• Clay Bar Pad: Effortlessly removes embedded contaminants, leaving your car’s surface smooth and ready for waxing.
• Gentle & Scratch-Free: Designed to protect delicate surfaces while delivering professional-grade results.
• Complete Solution: Perfect for cleaning, polishing, drying, and prepping your vehicle for a showroom-like finish.

title: Zingfix Brass Wire Detailing Brush
details:
Description:
A high-quality stainless steel handle wire brush with durable brass bristles – perfect for detailed cleaning, rust removal, and surface prep. Its compact design offers a firm grip and precise control, making it ideal for automotive, industrial, and household use. Gentle on metal surfaces yet tough on grime, this tool ensures efficient and scratch-free cleaning every time.

title: Zingfix 2-in-1 Air Dust Blowing & Soft Detailing Brush
details:
Description:
A versatile 2-in-1 cleaning tool combining a powerful air blower and ultra-soft brush—perfect for removing dust, dirt, and debris from delicate surfaces like car interiors, air vents, electronics, and dashboards. The soft bristles ensure scratch-free cleaning, while the blower provides precise airflow to clean tight and hard-to-reach spaces. Compact, lightweight, and a must-have for professional detailing and everyday use.
